title: The High Kings Live
description: Traditional Irish music from one of Ireland's premier folk groups.

title: Rally Village Food Festival
description: Local food vendors, craft beers, and artisan products.

title: DJ Tommy K
description: Late night party with resident DJ spinning classic hits.

title: Kids Fun Zone
description: Face painting, bouncy castles, and entertainment for children.

title: Classic Car Exhibition
description: Display of vintage rally cars and motorsport memorabilia.

title: The Tumbling Paddies
description: Energetic folk rock band bringing traditional tunes with a modern twist.

title: Rally Quiz Night
description: Test your rally knowledge with prizes for winning teams.

title: Street Performers
description: Jugglers, musicians, and entertainers throughout the afternoon.

title: DJ Battle
description: Local DJs compete for the crowd's approval.

title: Farmers Market
description: Local produce, crafts, and homemade goods.

title: Rally Simulator Experience
description: Try your hand at professional rally simulators.

title: Closing Ceremony Band
description: Celebration concert to close the rally weekend.
